title: Mastering Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
excerpt: A deep dive into preventing and exploiting XSS vulnerabilities, from reflected to stored and DOM-based attacks.

title: The Art of SQL Injection
excerpt: Learn how to identify and exploit SQL injection flaws to bypass authentication and extract sensitive data.

title: Modern Frontend Frameworks: React vs. Vue
excerpt: A comprehensive comparison of React and Vue, helping you choose the right tool for your next project.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
excerpt: Best practices for designing and implementing scalable, high-performance RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.

title: Social Engineering: The Human Element of Hacking
excerpt: Explore the psychological tactics used by hackers to manipulate individuals into divulging confidential information.

title: Introduction to Docker and Containers
excerpt: Understand the fundamentals of containerization and how Docker can streamline your development workflow.

title: Advanced CSS Animations and Transitions
excerpt: Bring your websites to life with advanced CSS techniques for creating smooth and performant animations.

title: Securing Your CI/CD Pipeline
excerpt: Strategies for integrating security checks and best practices into your continuous integration and delivery process.
